select.if: SELECT T2.DEAL_DATE,T1.GROUP_ID_1,T1.GROUP_ID_1_NAME,T1.UNIT_ID,T1.UNIT_NAME,T1.STD_6_ID,T1.STD_6_NAME,T2.NAME,T2.ACCOUNT, T2.PHONE,T2.HR_ID,CASE WHEN T3.IS_DEFAULT = 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ISDIVIDE, CASE WHEN T2.USERID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ISBIND,T4.ID FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_6_STD T1 LEFT JOIN PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_NET_PERSON T2 ON (T1.STD_6_ID = T2.STD_ID_6) LEFT JOIN PCDE.TAB_CDE_GROUP_CODE T3 ON (T1.UNIT_ID = T3.UNIT_ID) LEFT JOIN PORTAL.APDP_ORG T4 ON (T3.GROUP_ID_1=T4.CODE) WHERE T1.STATE = 'U' AND T1.IS_SIGN = 1 AND 1=2 ORDER BY T2.GROUP_ID_1, T2.UNIT_ID, T2.STD_ID_6

mapper.insert: MERGE INTO PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_NET_PERSON t USING(SELECT * FROM dual) t1 ON(t.STD_ID_6=#{std_6_id} AND T.DEAL_DATE=#{deal_date}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET t.userid=#{userid},t.name=#{name},t.account=#{username},t.phone=#{phone}, t.lev='2',t.unit_id=#{unit_id},t.unit_name=#{unit_name},t.group_id_1=#{group_id_1}, t.group_id_1_name=#{group_id_1_name},t.update_time=SYSDATE,t.remark='绑定', t.is_valid='1',t.hr_id=#{hr_id} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(USERID,NAME,ACCOUNT,PHONE,LEV,STD_ID_6,UNIT_ID,UNIT_NAME,GROUP_ID_1, GROUP_ID_1_NAME,CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,REMARK,IS_VALID,HR_ID) VALUES(#{userid},#{name},#{username},#{phone},'2',#{std_6_id},#{unit_id}, #{unit_name},#{group_id_1},#{group_id_1_name},sysdate,sysdate,'绑定','1',#{hr_id})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_NET_PERSON T WHERE T.STD_ID_6 = #{std_6_id} AND T.DEAL_DATE=#{deal_date}
